about_the_game:
Blaze a trail through the abyss of an ancient temple where the battle between good and evil gods has been waged since time immemorial. Felbound is an action-orientated, roguelike game that combines dungeon crawling with RPG-like progression. Slay enemies, collect materials, craft, die and start over. Persistent weapons, spells, potions, ephemeral blessings and their combinations will support you on your journey. Challenge dangerous bosses and rescue precious friends while avoiding deadly traps.

Explore the depths of the temple carefully because secrets are waiting to be discovered everywhere. Find treasure chambers full of potions, materials, valuable artefacts and tales that can be hidden everywhere.

Rescue prospective friends from the clutches of the shadows. Some will help you on your long and arduous journey by providing you with powerful equipment.

Get sanctified for a small endowment and with the right combination of weapons, armour, spells, potions and blessings, become the unstoppable god of destruction yourself, only to lose most of your power if you make the wrong step.

In the abyss of the temple you will encounter a variety of deadly bosses who have only one goal, your destruction! They will put your skills to the test. Find suitable strategies and equip yourself well otherwise you will get crushed!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Felbound is an action-adventure roguelike with a dose of RPG. Explore the abyss of the ancient temple and fight the shadows with a combination of weapons, spells, potions and ephemeral blessings. Uncover a myriad of secrets, save friends and become powerful as a god of destruction yourself!

English*, German*, Simplified Chinese*, Japanese*, Portuguese - Brazil*
